name: js/Group.js
js/InitialSettings.js
js/Mesh.js
js/RenderPass.js
js/Renderer.js
Renderer
description:
en: This class take a role as operator of rendering process. In order to render images to canvas, this Renderer class gathers other elements' data, decides a plan of drawing process, and then just execute it.
ja: このクラスはレンダリングプロセスの制御を司ります。Canvasにイメージをレンダリングするために、このRendererクラスは他の要素のデータを集め、描画プロセスの計画を決定し、実行します。

name: draw
description:
en: draw elements of the scene.
ja: sceneが持つオブジェクトを描画します

name: clearCanvas
description:
en: clear color/depth/stencil of canvas.
ja: canvasのカラー、デプス、ステンシルのいずれか又は全てをクリアします。

params.name: color_flg
params.description: true: clear color, false: don't clear color

params.name: depth_flg
params.description: true: clear depth, false: don't clear depth

params.name: stencil_flg
params.description: true: clear stencil, false: don't clear stencil

name: createTexturesForRenderTarget
description:
en: create textures as render target. (and attach it to framebuffer object internally.)
ja:レンダーターゲットとしてテクスチャを作成します（内部的にframebuffer objectにアタッチされます）。

unknown.tagValue: {Array} en: an array of created textures. ja:作成されたテクスチャの配列

params.name: width
params.description: en: width of texture. ja: テクスチャの幅

params.name: height
params.description: en: height of texture. ja: テクスチャの高さ

params.name: textureNum
params.description: en: the number of creation. ja:テクスチャを作る個数

return.description: en: an array of created textures. ja:作成されたテクスチャの配列

name: glContext
description:
en: Get WebGL context.
ja: WebGLコンテキストを取得します。

name: resize
description:
en: resize canvas and viewport.
ja: canvasとビューポートをリサイズします。

params.name: width
params.description: en: width to resize, ja: リサイズする幅

params.name: height
params.description: en: height to resize, ja:リサイズする高さ

name: js/Scene.js
Scene
description:
en: This Scene class is the top level element of scene graph hierarchy. To render scene, pass this scene element to Renderer.draw method.
ja: このSceneクラスはシーングラフ階層のトップレベルに位置する要素です。 シーンをレンダリングするには、このscene要素をRenderer.drawメソッドに渡します。

name: add
description:
en: Add the element to this scene as a child.
ja: このシーンにelementを子供として追加します。

name: addChild
description:
en: Add the element to this scene as a child.
ja: このシーンにelementを子供として追加します。

name: getChildren
description:
en: Get child elements which belong to this scene.
ja: このシーンに属していた子供の要素の配列を返します。

return.description: en: child elements of this scene. ja: このシーンの子供の要素

name: setCurrentAnimationValue
description:
en: Set animation input value (for instance frame value), This value affect all child elements in this scene graph (recursively).
ja: アニメーションのための入力値（例えばフレーム値）をセットします。この値はシーングラフに属する全ての子孫に影響します。

params.name: inputName
params.description: en: inputName name of input value. ja: 入力値の名前

params.name: inputValue
params.description: en: input value of animation. ja: アニメーションの入力値

name: prepareForRender
description:
en: Prepare for Rendering. You have to call this method before Renderer.draw method.
ja: レンダリングのための前処理を行います。Renderer.drawメソッドの前にこのメソッドを呼ぶ必要があります。

name: elements
description:
en: Get child elements which belong to this scene.
ja: このシーンに属していた子供の要素の配列を返します。

return.description: en: child elements of this scene. ja: このシーンの子供の要素

name: meshes
description:
en: Get child meshes which belong to this scene.
ja: このシーンに属していた子供のMesh要素の配列を返します。

return.description: en: child meshes of this scene. ja: このシーンの子供のMesh要素

name: lights
description:
en: Get child lights which belong to this scene.
ja: このシーンに属していた子供のLight要素の配列を返します。

return.description: en: child lights of this scene. ja: このシーンの子供のLight要素

name: cameras
description:
en: Get child cameras which belong to this scene.
ja: このシーンに属していた子供のCamera要素の配列を返します。

return.description: en: child cameras of this scene. ja: このシーンの子供のCamera要素

js/primitives/Cube.js
content:
import GLBoost from './../globals'
import Geometry from './../Geometry'
import Vector4 from './../math/Vector4'
import Vector3 from './../math/Vector3'
import Vector2 from './../math/Vector2'

export default class Cube extends Geometry {
  constructor(widthVector, vertexColor, canvas = GLBoost.CURRENT_CANVAS_ID) {
    super(canvas);

    this._setupVertexData(widthVector.divide(2.0), vertexColor);
  }

  _setupVertexData(widthVector, vertexColor) {
    var indices = [
      3, 1, 0, 2, 1, 3,
      4, 5, 7, 7, 5, 6,
      8, 9, 11, 11, 9, 10,
      15, 13, 12, 14, 13, 15,
      19, 17, 16, 18, 17, 19,
      20, 21, 23, 23, 21, 22
    ];


    var positions = [
      // upper
      new Vector3(-widthVector.x, widthVector.y, -widthVector.z),
      new Vector3(widthVector.x,  widthVector.y, -widthVector.z),
      new Vector3(widthVector.x,  widthVector.y, widthVector.z),
      new Vector3(-widthVector.x, widthVector.y, widthVector.z),
      // lower
      new Vector3(-widthVector.x, -widthVector.y, -widthVector.z),
      new Vector3(widthVector.x,  -widthVector.y, -widthVector.z),
      new Vector3(widthVector.x,  -widthVector.y, widthVector.z),
      new Vector3(-widthVector.x, -widthVector.y, widthVector.z),
      // front
      new Vector3(-widthVector.x, -widthVector.y, widthVector.z),
      new Vector3(widthVector.x,  -widthVector.y, widthVector.z),
      new Vector3(widthVector.x,  widthVector.y, widthVector.z),
      new Vector3(-widthVector.x, widthVector.y, widthVector.z),
      // back
      new Vector3(-widthVector.x, -widthVector.y, -widthVector.z),
      new Vector3(widthVector.x,  -widthVector.y, -widthVector.z),
      new Vector3(widthVector.x,  widthVector.y, -widthVector.z),
      new Vector3(-widthVector.x, widthVector.y, -widthVector.z),
      // right
      new Vector3(widthVector.x, -widthVector.y, -widthVector.z),
      new Vector3(widthVector.x,  -widthVector.y, widthVector.z),
      new Vector3(widthVector.x,  widthVector.y, widthVector.z),
      new Vector3(widthVector.x, widthVector.y, -widthVector.z),
      // left
      new Vector3(-widthVector.x, -widthVector.y, -widthVector.z),
      new Vector3(-widthVector.x,  -widthVector.y, widthVector.z),
      new Vector3(-widthVector.x,  widthVector.y, widthVector.z),
      new Vector3(-widthVector.x, widthVector.y, -widthVector.z)
    ];
    var colors = [
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),

      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),

      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),

      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),

      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),

      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w),
      new Vector4(vertexColor.x, vertexColor.y, vertexColor.z, vertexColor.w)
    ];
    var texcoords = [
      new Vector2(0.0, 0.0),
      new Vector2(1.0, 0.0),
      new Vector2(1.0, 1.0),
      new Vector2(0.0, 1.0),

      new Vector2(0.0, 0.0),
      new Vector2(1.0, 0.0),
      new Vector2(1.0, 1.0),
      new Vector2(0.0, 1.0),

      new Vector2(0.0, 0.0),
      new Vector2(1.0, 0.0),
      new Vector2(1.0, 1.0),
      new Vector2(0.0, 1.0),

      new Vector2(0.0, 0.0),
      new Vector2(1.0, 0.0),
      new Vector2(1.0, 1.0),
      new Vector2(0.0, 1.0),

      new Vector2(0.0, 0.0),
      new Vector2(1.0, 0.0),
      new Vector2(1.0, 1.0),
      new Vector2(0.0, 1.0),

      new Vector2(0.0, 0.0),
      new Vector2(1.0, 0.0),
      new Vector2(1.0, 1.0),
      new Vector2(0.0, 1.0)
    ];

    var normals = [
      // upper
      new Vector3(0, 1, 0),
      new Vector3(0, 1, 0),
      new Vector3(0, 1, 0),
      new Vector3(0, 1, 0),
      // lower
      new Vector3(0, -1, 0),
      new Vector3(0, -1, 0),
      new Vector3(0, -1, 0),
      new Vector3(0, -1, 0),
      // front
      new Vector3(0, 0, 1),
      new Vector3(0, 0, 1),
      new Vector3(0, 0, 1),
      new Vector3(0, 0, 1),
      // back
      new Vector3(0, 0, -1),
      new Vector3(0, 0, -1),
      new Vector3(0, 0, -1),
      new Vector3(0, 0, -1),
      // right
      new Vector3(1, 0, 0),
      new Vector3(1, 0, 0),
      new Vector3(1, 0, 0),
      new Vector3(1, 0, 0),
      // left
      new Vector3(-1, 0, 0),
      new Vector3(-1, 0, 0),
      new Vector3(-1, 0, 0),
      new Vector3(-1, 0, 0),
    ];

    this.setVerticesData({
      position: positions,
      color: colors,
      normal: normals,
      texcoord: texcoords
    }, [indices]);
  }

}

GLBoost["Cube"] = Cube;

name: js/primitives/Particle.js
Particle
description:
This Particle class handles particles expressions.
You can define particles behaviors in a custom vertex shader.
These particles are processed in GPU, so this is a very fast solution of particles expressions.

params.name: centerPointData
params.description: position array and the other data

params.name: JSON
params.description: which has other vertex attribute arrays you want

params.name: Canvas
params.description: Element which is generation source of WebGL context in current use or String which indicates the Canvas Element in jQuery like query string
